description: woman bending forward, washing her hands beneath water flowing from the mouth of a green dragon-shaped spout, holding a folded white cloth between her teeth; woman wears kimono with red, pink and white floral rondels and stripes, and purple and white stripes and flowers
markings: Artist’s seal: たいそ{Taiso} | Carver’s seal: 和田 {Wada}

text: No. 7 on the table of contents
title: Appearing Chilly, Behavior of a Kept Woman of the Bunka Era
